br.gov.sedurb.util

Class JSFUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.gov.sedurb.util.JSFUtils

  • public class JSFUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    General useful static utilies for working with JSF. NOTE: Updated to use JSF 1.2 ExpressionFactory.

      • getStringFromBundle

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromBundle(java.lang.String key)
        Pulls a String resource from the property bundle that is defined under the application <message-bundle> element in the faces config. Respects Locale
        Parameters:
        key - string message key
        Returns:
        Resource value or placeholder error String

      • getMessageFromBundle

        public static javax.faces.application.FacesMessage getMessageFromBundle(java.lang.String key,
                                                        javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity)
        Convenience method to construct a FacesMesssage from a defined error key and severity This assumes that the error keys follow the convention of using _detail for the detailed part of the message, otherwise the main message is returned for the detail as well.
        Parameters:
        key - for the error message in the resource bundle
        severity - severity of message
        Returns:
        Faces Message object

      • findComponentInRoot

        public static javax.faces.component.UIComponent findComponentInRoot(java.lang.String id)
        Locate an UIComponent in view root with its component id. Use a recursive way to achieve this. Taken from http://www.jroller.com/page/mert?entry=how_to_find_a_uicomponent
        Parameters:
        id - UIComponent id
        Returns:
        UIComponent object

      • findComponent

        public static javax.faces.component.UIComponent findComponent(javax.faces.component.UIComponent base,
                                              java.lang.String id)
        Locate an UIComponent from its root component. Taken from http://www.jroller.com/page/mert?entry=how_to_find_a_uicomponent
        Parameters:
        base - root Component (parent)
        id - UIComponent id
        Returns:
        UIComponent object

      • getPageURL

        public static java.lang.String getPageURL(java.lang.String view)
        Method to create a redirect URL. The assumption is that the JSF servlet mapping is "faces", which is the default
        Parameters:
        view - the JSP or JSPX page to redirect to
        Returns:
        a URL to redirect to
